Package fate.core.CompositionRoot

Class TcLog

java.lang.Object
fate.core.CompositionRoot.TcLog
public class TcLog extends Object
Logger class for various logging functionalities within test cases. Supports multiple log levels and formats, allowing detailed and structured logging.
